title: In The Shadows
description: Love Never Dies...When you are immortal, that is.Mysteriously sexy, cursed warlock slash bartender, Deidrick searches for a loophole in his curse, and a way to bind his bound lover Rose to one body for the rest of eternity...a profound desire that leads him to dark places.Sweet, darling Rose reads tarot cards...in secret of course, except for her few friends; but she also dabbles with spells, as one does. After conducting a soul mate ritual, Rose is ecstatic at meeting the love of her life, Giovanni Boracelli who happens to be the perfect fianc√©. But not all is what it seems when the cards throw her a curveball she wasn't expecting.Follow Rose and Deidrick as they navigate their paths and set in motion a series of events that will forever change their fate....and if you need to get caught up, grab your copies of In The Cards and In The Blood! All books can be read as a standalone as well as part of the series.
author: Ariel  Dawn
